ing: 1 (5.6 ounce) package Spanish rice mix (such as KnorrÂ® Fiesta Sidesâ„¢)
1 (8 ounce) package frozen chopped bell peppers and onions
salt and ground black pepper to taste
des: "This is a great set-it-and-forget-it recipe using KnorrÂ® Spanish rice. Just prepare the rice (or use some leftover rice from the night before), mix it with a few freezer staples, beans, salsa, and spices, and blam! The best chili ever after a few hours in the slow cooker. Garnish with cheese, sour cream, and/or diced onions. This would also go great on top of a big pile of fries on game day."
ins:
Combine water, Spanish rice mix, and vegetable oil in a saucepan; bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer, covered, until rice is tender, about 7 minutes.
Pour rice into a slow cooker. Add chili beans, frozen bell peppers and onions, salsa, chili powder, paprika, cumin, salt and black pepper. Stir well to combine.
Cook on Low until flavors combine, 6 to 8 hours.
